snippet: Are doctors more likely to brief a woman on the use of emergency contraceptives if the woman’s demographics make the doctor think she is likely to need a “Plan B”?
abstract: Are doctors more likely to brief a woman on the use of emergency contraceptives if the woman’s demographics make the doctor think she is likely to need a “Plan B”?

headline.main: Poor, Black and Hispanic Women Are More Often Counseled on Emergency Contraception
